name: Sober Soldier
description:
Game made for IndieTales Jam. The theme is 'One Room'.

Play as a soldier left by his company team because they are DRUNK. Roll out the tank by acting out your team's supposed roles and get to the rendezvous point.

  • Drive the Tank
  • Use the Artillery Machine gun
  • Aim, Fire and Load the Cannon
  • Fix the Tank

Credits:

- made by G E A R Studio and mahyellaw

- main menu music: Discovered V2 by .Gomi

- in-game music: Bums by BloodPixelHero

- victory music: Synth_8 by Erokia

Any feedback or criticisms are greatly appreciated! :D

- mahyellaw
